alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Rooks and southern Phillips Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 624 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Prairie View to near Edmond. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phillipsburg, Glade and Speed. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Kansas.
